Text: hi! i wonder what's the difference between the Platinum and Ultimate versions...

Well, there are a few options missing in the Platinum version.

Platinum doesn't come with the following options:

Convert 2D video to 3D video
Convert 3D video to 3D video
Crop video
Add video watermark
Edit video effects
Add subtitles
Add soundtracks
Preview video customized
Compare source video and video customized
